body: One student's valuable instrument has been stolen right before an important performance. If you succeed at a DC 30 Perform check, you find a suitable replacement and offers from investors gain you 1d3 points of Goods. Otherwise, you lose 1d3 points of Influence.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Bardic College Events/Stolen Instrument
name: Stolen Instrument
